p: There was a significant difference in WA-MCF incidence between sexes, with males having an OR of 0.38 (95% C.I. 0.16–0.78) compared to females. There was no significant difference between the incidence of WA-MCF cases within the age groups although there was a positive relationship with heifers and cows more likely to have WA-MCF compared to calves. The OR for heifers was 1.72 (95% C.I. 0.86–3.64) and cows 1.49 (95% C.I. 0.76–3.11) respectively (Additional file 2).
